content: Is there an API endpoint for deactivating users?
@Sean Wallitsch yes, in that everything the Zulip webapp does is with the API. It looks like it is DELETE /users/15 where 15 is the user ID.
(We have a planned project to cover all endpoints in our docs)
https://zulipchat.com/api/get-all-users should let you get user IDs
Thanks, I was using the API documentation as a crutch
